verses.text: Then \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w*, and the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w*, and the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Ye have \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* all that \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you, and have \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* in all that I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you:

Ye have not \w left|strong="H5800"\w* your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* these \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, but have \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And now the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath given \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* unto your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, as he \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* them: therefore now \w return|strong="H6437"\w* ye, and \w get|strong="H3212"\w* you unto your \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, \add and\add* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of your \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* you on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

But take \w diligent|strong="H3966"\w* \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* and the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* you, to \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in all his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and to \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* unto him, and to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him with all your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* and with all your \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.
So \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* them, and sent them \w away|strong="H7971"\w*: and they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* unto their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*.

¶ Now to the \add one\add* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* had \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \add possession\add* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*: but unto the \add other\add* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* thereof \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w*. And when \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* sent them \w away|strong="H7971"\w* also unto their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, then he \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* them,

And he \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Return|strong="H7725"\w* with \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w riches|strong="H5233"\w* unto your \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, and with \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*, with \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and with \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and with \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, and with \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w raiment|strong="H8008"\w*: \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* with your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* and the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* from the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, which \add is\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* unto the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of their \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, whereof they were \w possessed|strong="H0270"\w*, according to the \w word|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And when they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w borders|strong="H1552"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, that \add are\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* and the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* there an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* by \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* to see \w to|strong="H4758"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* and the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, in the \w borders|strong="H1552"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, at the \w passage|strong="H5676"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And when the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add of it\add*, the whole \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H6950"\w* at \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, to go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w* against them.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, and to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, and to the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*,

And with him \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w princes|strong="H5387"\w*, of \w each|strong="H0259"\w* \w chief|strong="H5387"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* a \w prince|strong="H0001"\w* throughout all the \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and each \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \add was\add* an \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* among the \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 22.14 \ft chief…: Heb. house of the father\f*

¶ And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, and to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, and to the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and they \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* with them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the whole \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, What \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w* \add is\add* this that ye have \w committed|strong="H4603"\w* against the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, in that ye have \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* you an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, that ye might \w rebel|strong="H4775"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*?

\add Is\add* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of \w Peor|strong="H6465"\w* too \w little|strong="H4592"\w* for us, from which we are not \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* until this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, although there was a \w plague|strong="H5063"\w* in the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*,

But that ye must turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*? and it will be, \add seeing\add* ye \w rebel|strong="H4775"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* he will be \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w* with the whole \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Notwithstanding|strong="H0389"\w*, if the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of your \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* \add be\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, \add then\add* pass ye \w over|strong="H5674"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, wherein the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="H7931"\w*, and take \w possession|strong="H0270"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* us: but \w rebel|strong="H4775"\w* not against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* \w rebel|strong="H4775"\w* against us, in \w building|strong="H1129"\w* you an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w beside|strong="H1107"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Did not \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w* \w commit|strong="H4603"\w* a \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w* in the accursed \w thing|strong="H2764"\w*, and \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* \w fell|strong="H1961"\w* on all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? and that \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w perished|strong="H1478"\w* not \w alone|strong="H0259"\w* in his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

¶ Then the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* and the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, and \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* of \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* of \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, he \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w*, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* he shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w*; if \add it be\add* in \w rebellion|strong="H4777"\w*, or if in \w transgression|strong="H4604"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, (\w save|strong="H3467"\w* us not this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*,)

That we have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* us an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* to \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, or if to \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* thereon burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* or meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, or if to \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H2077"\w* thereon, let the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* himself \w require|strong="H1245"\w* \add it;\add*

And if we have not \add rather\add* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* it for \w fear|strong="H1674"\w* of \add this\add* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, In time to \w come|strong="H4279"\w* your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* might \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto our \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What have ye to do with the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?\f + \fr 22.24 \ft In time…: Heb. To morrow\f*

For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* a \w border|strong="H1366"\w* between us and you, ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* and \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*; ye have no \w part|strong="H2506"\w* in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: so shall your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H7673"\w* our \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* \w from|strong="H1115"\w* \w fearing|strong="H3372"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Therefore we \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us now \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* us an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, not for burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, nor for \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*:

But \add that\add* it \add may be\add* a \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* between us, and you, and our \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* us, that we might \w do|strong="H5647"\w* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him with our burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and with our \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, and with our peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*; that your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* may not \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to our \w children|strong="H1121"\w* in time to \w come|strong="H4279"\w*, Ye have no \w part|strong="H2506"\w* in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Therefore \w said|strong="H0559"\w* we, that it shall be, when they should \add so\add* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to us or to our \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* in time to \w come|strong="H4279"\w*, that we may \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \add again\add*, \w Behold|strong="H7200"\w* the \w pattern|strong="H8403"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, not for burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, nor for \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*; but it \add is\add* a \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* between us and you.

God \w forbid|strong="H2486"\w* that we should \w rebel|strong="H4775"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* for burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, for meat \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w*, or for \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, beside the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* that \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* his \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

¶ And when \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* and \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* which \add were\add* with him, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, it \w pleased|strong="H3190"\w* them.\f + \fr 22.30 \ft pleased…: Heb. was good in their eyes\f*

And \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, and to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, and to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, This \w day|strong="H3117"\w* we \w perceive|strong="H3045"\w* that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* us, because ye have not \w committed|strong="H4603"\w* this \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: \w now|strong="H0227"\w* ye have \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 22.31  t now: Heb. then *

¶ And \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w*, \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, and from the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* them \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

And the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w pleased|strong="H3190"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and did not \w intend|strong="H0559"\w* to go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against them in \w battle|strong="H6635"\w*, to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* wherein the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* and \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \add Ed:\add* for it \add shall be\add* a \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* between us that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 22.34 \ft Ed: that is, A witness\f*
